docs: would definitely stay here again after our two night experience .during a recent road trip , we decided to stay at the marriott residence inn to give ourselves a much needed break .unfortunately , this room faced the highway and being a light sleeperthis hotel is what you would expect out of a residence inn located in a busy shopping area ., it is good for business and short trips . </DOC> overall i enjoyed the stay and would return .hotel is located in a mall next to a courtyard hotel . free parking .sleep quality is tough here , as it is surrounded by various main streets and a highway .breakfast is free and offering lots of hot and cold choices . </DOC> all in all , i would stay here again .location is near a shopping center and lots of stand alone restaurants .for a special treat , try the windsor inn ( great wings and bar food ) about 7 mile north of the hotel .very close to scranton , but also close to the mall and many restaurants .just off 81 , so easy to get to . </DOC> the staff worked hard to make sure everything was right .great location off i 81 . free hot and cold breakfast . free parking . free internet .there is a chinese / sushi buffet 100 yards away and numerous other restaurants within 2 min drive .location is close to everything .all in all hotel was nice . </DOC> the location , poor .there is a wendy 's down the hill . </DOC> good hotel to overnight at or spend a couple of days .we were in need of sleep -- breaking up a 10 hour drive with an overnight here .but room was quiet and peaceful .we chose this marriott as our stopover location going from va to nh and back , and we were so glad we did .the only room negative was the heat from the gas fireplace pilot light in the middle of the summer ! ! ! </DOC> and it would be back on track .relatively easy to get off and on the highway -- not much in the areabreakfast area was ample ( i thought ) and a decent selection of food , too .our room was quite from hotel noise but on our side there was a lot of road noise fro rt 81 .the location was a bit tricky to find the first time even with the gps . </DOC> breakfast area was busy as the food was great ..... even had some andouille sausage one morning .and the hotel was close to the very nice restaurant nosh .the hotel was dog - friendly and had lots of walking areas and doggy bags available .if the doors into the hotel had auto - openers on them it would have been the perfect experience ! ! !and while we saw lots of folks who stayed here as extended - stay hotel patrons , we had no problem with anyone or their lifestyle while working out - of - town .
summary: The personnel are nice.  The Bobbi was top notch and they are very happy to do it. It was a pretty nice experience but you would expect that if you are staying in the parking lot.</DOC><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad>
